MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA18 postcode area of Cumnock, affecting properties in Cairnscadden Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:06pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:30pm on Saturday 6th February 2021.
